Package flounder.shaders

Contains classes for creating shaders and loading Uniform variables to Shader's.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlounderShaders
    Class capable of loading OBJ files into shaders.
    Shader
    Class that represents a loaded shader.
    ShaderBuilder
    A class capable of setting up a Shader.
    ShaderData  
    ShaderDeleteRequest
    A class that can process a request to delete a model.
    ShaderLoadRequest
    A class that can process a request to load a model.
    ShaderType
    A class that represents a shader type.
    Uniform
    Represents a uniform variable uploaded from Java to OpenGL shaders.
    UniformBool
    Represents a float uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformFloat
    Represents a float uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformMat2
    Represents a Matrix2F uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformMat3
    Represents a Matrix3F uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformMat4
    Represents a Matrix4F uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformSampler2D
    Represents a texture sampler uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformVec2
    Represents a 2 value vector uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformVec3
    Represents a 3 value vector uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
    UniformVec4
    Represents a 4 value vector uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ShaderData.Uniforms  

Package flounder.shaders Description

Contains classes for creating shaders and loading Uniform variables to Shader's.
